meta.title: TechFix - Computer Repair Services
meta.description: Professional computer repair services including hardware and software maintenance for computers and laptops.

hero.title: Professional Computer Repair Services
hero.subtitle: Expert solutions for all your computer and laptop problems

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of computer repair and maintenance services

items.title: Software Troubleshooting
items.description: We diagnose and fix various software issues including system crashes, errors, and performance problems.

items.title: Formatting and OS Installation
items.description: Complete system formatting and fresh installation of Windows, macOS, or Linux operating systems.

items.title: Virus Removal
items.description: Detection and removal of viruses, malware, spyware, and other malicious software from your device.

items.title: Hardware Repair and Replacement
items.description: Repair or replacement of damaged computer components including motherboards, RAM, hard drives, and more.

items.title: Cleaning and Thermal Paste Application
items.description: Physical cleaning of computer components and application of fresh thermal paste to improve cooling efficiency.

items.title: Data Recovery
items.description: Recovery of lost or deleted data from damaged hard drives or other storage media.

about.title: About TechFix
about.content: TechFix is a professional computer repair service with over 10 years of experience in the industry. Our team of certified technicians is dedicated to providing fast and reliable solutions for all your computer and laptop problems. We pride ourselves on our quality service, quick turnaround times, and affordable prices.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for any inquiries or to schedule a service appointment.
